channel.title: -=- Fury Of Edge 317 -=-
channel.description:
[center][b][i][u][size=12pt]-=- Furyy Of Edge, 317 -=-[/size][/u][/i][/b]
[u][b][size=14pt]SERVER IS ONLINE PLEASE REGISTE ON FORUMS, THANKS[/size][/b][/u]
Welcome, Please don't flaim this is my FIRST source i hav ever made, if you could please can you please give me some points whitch i can make it better. This is my first sourve and would like to keep coding and making new project.
Fourms link - please can i have permishion to post link, Thanks
317-Features
*100% Godsword Stance/Specials/Blocking/Running/Attacking *Animated-Gwd Boss's-Zammy/Commander/arma Ect. *100%Range Anim Pull Back Emote *Most Dupes Fixed That i Know Of. *Shops Edited Realy Good ( 60% Same items as 2speced) *Exp Lock Working unlocked/locked Working 100% *Player Equipment Stats working/items on Death Working 99% *100%-Keep Firecape On Death NO MATTER WHAT ! *Home = Varrock. All Npc's Have Been Neatly Coded at home *Custom Skillzone Added By me *85% Perfect Combat *90%Mage Instant Freeze And Cast *Npc's Drops Have Been Fully Edited ! MAde it Harder To Get A Drop!! *Quite a Good Econmy *Proper Dragon Mace Not The Dragon Head!! *99% Working Emotes -100% Emote InterFace's 100%fletching 100% att/def/str/range/magic/pray/hp 95%cooking 90% mining 99%helbore 90% WC
Madia, Not Everthing.[URL=http://tinypic.com/r/24brdqh/6]Click for firemaking.[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/51y53c/6]Click for flathing.[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/288qkus/6]Click for crafting.[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/x3yq/6]Cow hides into hard/Crafting[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/25g7409/6]Whip[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/29wv96x/6]GS Spec/gfx[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/i2ogas/6]Ancient/Ancient staff, Auto[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/5f272s/6]Log into bow (u), bow string into bow.[/URL]
Pics, more in-game/Forums [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/otj4av.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/otj4av.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/o6xwds.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/dg5vtk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2ujibg8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2zdow01.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2a9v5zs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/10ero0y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/23j31cl.png[/img]
[size=24pt]I know this is not the best source out there but please tell me what i can improve since this is my first source.[/center] Thanks[/size]
